<title level="1" pfs="">[Corrupt Guards](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1565)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 35

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 33

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 12">[Corrupt Guards](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1565)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City](/Sources.aspx?ID=13) pg. 27</row>

**Perception** +22; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Dwarven](/Languages.aspx?ID=3)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +25, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +19, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +21, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +20, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +25

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +3

**Con** +5

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)_, _+1 [composite shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=75)_ (50 arrows), key to Chiselrock's Prison, _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [maul](/Weapons.aspx?ID=33)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 32 

**Fort** +24 

**Ref** +20 

**Will** +21 

</row>

**HP** 215

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_maul_ +28 ([Shove](/Traits.aspx?ID=193)),
**Damage** 2d12+15 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_composite_ shortbow +25 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d8+8 piercing

**Improved Knockdown** <actions string="Two Actions" />  A corrupt guard can dash their foe to the ground with a single blow. They attempt a single melee Strike. If this Strike hits, they also apply the critical success effect of a [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40). If they used a two-handed melee weapon (such as a [maul](/Weapons.aspx?ID=33)) for the Strike, they can use the weapon's damage die size instead of the regular die size for the damage from a critical Trip, and they ignore Trip's requirement to have a hand free.

</column>
name: Corrupt Guards

text: Corrupt Guards Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 35 Unspecific Lore : DC 33 Specific Lore : DC 30 Corrupt Guards Source Pathfinder #148: Fires of the Haunted City pg. 27 Perception +22; darkvision Languages Common, Dwarven Skills Athletics +25, Diplomacy +19, Intimidation +21, Society +20, Stealth +25 Str +7 Dex +3 Con +5 Int +0 Wis +4 Cha +1 Items +1 resilient breastplate , +1 composite shortbow (50 arrows), key to Chiselrock's Prison, +1 striking maul --- AC 32 Fort +24 Ref +20 Will +21 HP 215 Attack of Opportunity Reaction --- Speed 20 feet Melee Single Action maul +28 (Shove), Damage 2d12+15 bludgeoning Ranged Single Action composite shortbow +25 (deadly 1d10, range increment 60 feet, reload 0), Damage 1d8+8 piercing Improved Knockdown Two Actions A corrupt guard can dash their foe to the ground with a single blow. They attempt a single melee Strike. If this Strike hits, they also apply the critical success effect of a Trip. If they used a two-handed melee weapon (such as a maul) for the Strike, they can use the weapon's damage die size instead of the regular die size for the damage from a critical Trip, and they ignore Trip's requirement to have a hand free.
